cellularAutomata
Class CAFactory

java.lang.Object
  cellularAutomata.AbstractCAFactory
      cellularAutomata.CAFactory

public class CAFactory
extends AbstractCAFactory

Creates a factory for instantiating the CA lattice, lattice graphics, rule, and file storage. These classes are not related (by inheritance) but they should be instantiated together because they cooperate as a unit.

Author:
David Bahr

Field Summary

          The amount of memory being used by the current lattice.

Field Detail

REWIND_PERCENTAGE

public static final double REWIND_PERCENTAGE
A suggested minimum for the number of steps that the CA can rewind, expressed as a fractional percentage of the number of rows in the simulation. In other words, 1.0 means 100% of the rows, and 2.0 means 200% of the rows.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DEFAULT_REWIND_STEPS

public static final int DEFAULT_REWIND_STEPS
The default number of steps that the CA will rewind if not specified elsewhere.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

currentLatticeMemory

public static long currentLatticeMemory
The amount of memory being used by the current lattice.

getGraphicsPanel

Gets the panel that draws the CA.

Specified by:
